general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs, schools, reports, and initiatives at Sharda University for the 2025-26 academic year. It includes information on dental sciences, medical sciences, nursing, examinations, academic credits, curriculum feedback, university brochures, leadership, history, statutory bodies, tenders, university acts, COVID-19 related information, counselling services, skill enhancement programs, language and communication initiatives, entrepreneurship, innovation, an FM radio station (Suno Sharda-90.8FM), a mentoring portal (Paramarsh), international credit transfer programs, and specific campus locations in Uzbekistan and Agra.

eligibility_criteria: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related field.
Minimum GPA of 3.0 on a 4.0 scale.
Proficiency in at least one programming language.
required_documents: Official transcripts from all previous institutions.

academic_programs.program_name: Example Bachelor of Arts in History
eligibility_criteria: Minimum GPA of 2.5 on a 4.0 scale.
Completion of high school mathematics requirement.
required_documents: One letter of recommendation from a teacher.

career_path.summary: This text outlines potential career paths following a course, focusing on research in renewable energy technologies, the integration of renewables into existing power systems, and roles within electrical power and energy companies, including providing cloud infrastructure for enterprise systems.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Research Industries in designing, developing and building of renewable energy technologies.
• Integration of renewable energy generation into existing power systems
• Electrical Power and Energy Companies such as,
• Provide cloud infrastructure for enterprise systems
